hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
### use this if you want to stop dead on its tracks #exit 1
#cd /var/www/html/eol_php_code/applications/content_server/resources #rm -f wikipedia_generation_status*.txt #[ -f wikipedia_*.tmp ] && rm -f wikipedia_*.tmp || echo "Files do not exist"
cd /var/www/html/eol_php_code/update_resources/connectors #php wikipedia.php _ en #English
### this is normal operation: php run.php _ '{"connector":"gen_wikipedia_by_lang", "divisor":10, "task":"initial", "langx":"en", "cont_2next_lang":"Y", "six_coverage":"1st"}' ### should generate 80.tar.gz
### a utility: investigate why the final 80.tr.gz doesn't have media extension ### that is after finishing all the 80_1of10 to 80_10of10 ### php wikipedia.php _ '{"language":"en","task":"generate_resource","range_from":"","range_to":"","actual":"","debug_taxon":"","six_coverage":"1st"}'
#--------------------- #initially six (6) connectors #echo "start Wikipedia en build..." #php wikipedia.php jenkins en generate_resource 1 416666 1of6 #php wikipedia.php jenkins en generate_resource 416666 833332 2of6 #php wikipedia.php jenkins en generate_resource 833332 1249998 3of6 #php wikipedia.php jenkins en generate_resource 1249998 1666664 4of6 #php wikipedia.php jenkins en generate_resource 1666664 2083330 5of6 #php wikipedia.php jenkins en generate_resource 2083330 2500000 6of6 #all remaining
### was set to continue with these 2 below. But they are very wrong, so I commented it now. ### ../Environmental tagger for EOL resources/Wikipedia EN (English), ### utility_taxon_wiki_per_language_stats
